DOC.brief_summary: This study prospective , longitudinal , multi-center , within patient evaluation patient articular cartilage defect knee inadequate response prior non-Carticel surgical treatment . Patients meet eligibility criterion enrol study . Subsequent implantation Carticel patient follow-up every 6-months 48-months .
DOC.criteria: Provided write informed consent Documented history least one Grade III Grade IV defect ( modify Outerbridge classification ) medial lateral femoral condyle trochlea Failed prior treatment articular cartilage defect knee , e.g . inadequate response non ACI surgical procedure treat lesion , within past 3 yr Patient report overall knee condition 5 less Modified Cinn Rating System patient must cartilage defect locate medial lateral femoral condyle trochlea inadequate response prior arthroscopic nonCarticel surgical repair procedure see
